advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Take your game to the max

editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

editorialNotes.standard: It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

name: Dude Theft Wars FPS Open World

editorialNotes.standard: Crack the case of a missing teenager using clues hidden in her phone in this suspenseful mystery.

This breathtaking game mixes tycoon-style park management with electrifying dino-on-dino battles, starring characters and critters from the blockbuster film. We love tinkering with our dinosaur DNA to evolve our thunder lizards into more powerful specimens while also expanding our dream park’s high-tech facilities. When it comes time to test your dinosaurs’ mettle in the arena, strength and strategy are the keys to prehistoric pugilist victories. And luckily, the Indominus rex stays inside her cage. For now.

Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabam’s beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but you’ll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponents—and progressing through treacherous story quests.
Wield the magic of Merlin as you roam stunning landscapes in one of the prettiest idle RPGs we’ve ever played.
